document.full_text: the idea that a greek debt restructuring could be carried out in an orderly way is a "fairytale," european central bank board member lorenzo bini smaghi said in an interview published on monday.
document.title: ecb's bini smaghi warns against default repercussions
lines_and_colors: the idea that a greek debt restructuring could be carried out in an orderly way is a "fairytale," european central bank board member lorenzo bini smaghi said in an interview published on monday.
